openPositions.title: Senior SAP Consultant
openPositions.summary: Join our dynamic team as a Senior SAP Consultant and lead transformational projects for our global clients. You'll work with cutting-edge SAP technologies while mentoring junior team members and driving business value through innovative solutions.
responsibilities: Lead end-to-end SAP implementation projects for global clients
Design and configure SAP modules based on business requirements
Mentor and guide junior consultants in technical and functional areas
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver integrated solutions
Conduct client workshops and training sessions
Provide ongoing support and optimization for existing SAP landscapes
requirements: 5+ years of hands-on SAP consulting experience
Strong expertise in at least two SAP modules (FI/CO, MM, SD, PP, etc.)
Experience with SAP S/4HANA implementations
Proven track record of successful project delivery
Excellent communication and client-facing skills
Bachelor's degree in Business, IT, or related field

openPositions.title: SAP Functional Analyst
openPositions.summary: We're seeking a motivated SAP Functional Analyst to join our growing team. This role offers excellent opportunities for career development while working on diverse projects across multiple industries.
responsibilities: Analyze business requirements and translate them into SAP solutions
Configure SAP modules to meet client specifications
Create detailed functional specifications for development teams
Conduct system testing and user acceptance testing
Prepare training materials and conduct end-user training
Support go-live activities and post-implementation support
requirements: 2-4 years of SAP functional consulting experience
Strong knowledge of at least one SAP module
Experience with requirements gathering and documentation
Understanding of business processes and best practices
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Excellent written and verbal communication skills

openPositions.title: SAP Technical Developer
openPositions.summary: Join our technical team as an SAP Developer and work on complex customizations and integrations. You'll be involved in developing innovative solutions that enhance our clients' SAP landscapes.
responsibilities: Develop custom ABAP programs, reports, and interfaces
Create and maintain SAP workflows and forms
Build integrations between SAP and external systems
Perform code reviews and ensure development best practices
Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues
Collaborate with functional consultants on solution design
requirements: 3+ years of SAP ABAP development experience
Strong knowledge of SAP development tools and methodologies
Experience with SAP integration technologies (RFC, IDoc, Web Services)
Understanding of SAP data structures and database concepts
Experience with debugging and performance optimization
Knowledge of software development lifecycle

openPositions.title: Junior SAP Consultant
openPositions.summary: Perfect opportunity for recent graduates or career changers to start their SAP consulting journey. You'll receive comprehensive training and mentorship while working on real client projects.
responsibilities: Assist senior consultants with SAP configuration and testing
Support data migration and validation activities
Participate in client meetings and requirement gathering sessions
Create and maintain project documentation
Conduct basic user training and support
Learn and apply SAP best practices
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business, IT, Engineering, or related field
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Eagerness to learn SAP technologies and business processes
Ability to work in a team environment
Willingness to travel to client sites as required
